00168 void CnipolRunHists::PostFill()
00169 {
00170    float min, max;
00171    float margin=0.2;
00172    float prefix=0.028;
00173 
00174    //DrawHorizLine(asym_vs_bunch_x90, -0.5, NBUNCH-0.5, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00175 
00176    GetMinMaxOption(prefix, NBUNCH, gBunchAsym.Ax45[0], margin, min, max);
00177    ((TH1*) o["asym_vs_bunch_x45"])->SetBins(NBUNCH, -0.5, NBUNCH-0.5, 100, min, max);
00178    DrawHorizLine( (TH1*) o["asym_vs_bunch_x45"], -0.5, NBUNCH-0.5, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00179 }

00183 void CnipolRunHists::Fill(MeasInfo &ri)
00184 {
00185    map<UShort_t, Float_t>::iterator ib;
00186 
00187    for (ib=ri.fWallCurMon.begin(); ib!=ri.fWallCurMon.end(); ++ib)
00188    {
00189       ((TH1*) o["wall_current_monitor"])->SetBinContent(ib->first, ib->second);
